title: Creatine for Sleep Fatigue
description: 5-10g of Creatine Monohydrate daily. In acute sleep deprivation, doses up to 20g (0.35g/kg) have been shown to preserve cognitive function and processing speed by maintaining brain ATP levels.

title: NSDR (Non-Sleep Deep Rest)
description: A 10-30 minute guided protocol (Yoga Nidra style) used to transition the nervous system from a high-alert state to deep relaxation. Effective for mid-day recovery or falling back asleep at 3 AM.

title: 4-7-8 Breathing
description: Inhale for 4s, hold for 7s, exhale for 8s. Repeat 4 times. This specific ratio activates the parasympathetic nervous system and stimulates the vagus nerve to lower heart rate rapidly.

title: Box Breathing
description: Inhale 4s, hold 4s, exhale 4s, hold 4s. Used by tactical teams (Navy SEALs) to maintain calm under high stress. Stabilizes the autonomic nervous system.

title: Magnesium Threonate
description: 300-400mg of Magnesium L-Threonate 30-60 minutes before bed. Crosses the blood-brain barrier more effectively than other forms to promote GABAergic signaling.

title: Bedroom Temperature Drop
description: Keep the bedroom temperature between 65-68°F (18-20°C). Facilitates the natural drop in core body temperature required for sleep onset.
